post:
Recently lost my job and trying to unload some of my older test hardware that's sitting around.  

I've got an HP ProCurve 4204vl (J8770A) with single PSU and 2x Mini-GBIC modules (J8776A) and 2x Gig-T/SFP modules (J9033A) that works and passes all self-tests.  

![](http://i.imgur.com/euWnuMi.jpg)

Looking to get $600 obo + shipping (chassis alone retails for ~$1k). Shipping weight would be ~30lbs and ships from 72002.

Mods: I couldn't really find a definitive answer on the posting of hardware, etc. So please move/delete as needed.
